resources.string:
Extract the following information from the provided invoice image:
 Item names
 Item total bills
 Subtotal bill
 Date
 If the invoice is organized in a table, look for the item name in the first column, the item total in the second, and the subtotal in the last row. If the invoice is an itemized list, search for item names followed by their respective quantities and prices. Calculate the item total by multiplying quantity and price. The date is usually located in the header or footer. The subtotal or total is often found at the bottom of the invoice.
